text: Villiers-le-Sec is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune of Creully sur Seulles.Arrêté préfectoral 8 September 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Villiers-le-Sec, Calvados
